manifest.name: Daily Named Folder
manifest.description: Like daily notes, but nested in a named daily folder. Better for attachment management. Includes more flexible naming.
manifest.author: Nemo Andrea

data.manifestValue: Like daily notes, but nested in a named daily folder. Better for attachment management. Includes more flexible naming.
data.communityListValue: Like daily notes, but nested in a daily folder with a oneline summary. Better for attachment management & glanceability.
